in a way that gives you motivation (= enthusiasm and determination): Motivationally, I am sure she will be an excellent manager for the team. At first, he was behind the other kids, both academically and motivationally.
More examplesFewer examplesWhat we really need is a motivationally inspiring goal to aim at this year.He is very good at engaging others motivationally. It was a long, motivationally exhausting week at the office.I am motivationally guided by my goal of getting into the team.
